stories.text: It seems all the hCaptcha verifications I receive are for buses, boats and trains? They don't seem limited by geography or by recency. I'm curious why these particular artifacts and whether this has always been the case.
stories.title: Ask HN: Why does Cloudflare/hCaptcha care so much about buses, boats and trains?

stories.text:
Have you worked on desktop development in the past and transitioned into web development?

Since web development seems to be replacing the desktop, I'm wondering if the change is worth it. I heard web development is a lot more messy.
stories.title: Ask HN: Transitioning from Desktop to Web Development
